caption:
When confidence shines this bright, it’s unforgettable. ✨🥰⁠
⁠
"I just wanted to reach out and let you know how much we love my daughter’s new wig! She was diagnosed at 3 with alopecia Areata and since then we have tried several wigs, toppers, real hair, synthetic hair and this one by far is the best! It’s light weight and the color and cut is amazing. We purchased it through the children with hair loss program." ⁠-Breanne W.⁠
⁠
P.S. Huge shoutout to Children With Hair Loss @cwhl_org⁠ for the incredible work they do supporting children experiencing hair loss — we’re proud to stand with you! 🫶⁠
⁠
Details:⤵️⁠

🖤 Color: Luscious Caramel⁠
